frameworks.title: Build-in-Public Milestone Celebration
frameworks.description: Celebrates achievements while providing transparent metrics and lessons learned, creating social proof and community engagement.
frameworks.structure:
1. Achievement announcement with specific metrics
2. Gratitude expression
3. Lessons learned (what worked/didn't work)
4. Future optimization plans
5. Community engagement hook
frameworks.prompt:
Just hit [MILESTONE] on day [X] of [BIGGER GOAL]

I am very grateful

Here are some things I've learned:

[SPECIFIC LESSON WITH PROOF/METRICS]

Where I misstepped:
- [MISTAKE 1 with impact]
- [MISTAKE 2 with impact]

What I will improve:
[SPECIFIC OPTIMIZATION PLAN]

[FUTURE COMMITMENT/TIMELINE]

frameworks.title: Technical Deep-Dive Education
frameworks.description: Breaks down complex technical concepts into digestible, numbered components with practical examples and implementation details.
frameworks.structure:
1. Topic introduction with goal statement
2. Numbered component breakdown (typically 3-4 items)
3. Detailed explanation of each component
4. Practical example/use case
5. Implementation flow with steps
6. Future application tease
frameworks.prompt:
I am diving into [TECHNICAL TOPIC] this week.

Goal: [SPECIFIC IMPLEMENTATION GOAL]

There are [X] components:
[NUMBERED LIST OF COMPONENTS]

Let's walk through [PRACTICAL EXAMPLE].

[DETAILED BREAKDOWN OF EACH COMPONENT]

[STEP-BY-STEP IMPLEMENTATION FLOW]

And that's the foundation.

Next, I will [FUTURE APPLICATION].

frameworks.title: Controversial Prediction with Reasoning
frameworks.description: Makes bold industry predictions backed by logical reasoning and personal experience to spark engagement and establish thought leadership.
frameworks.structure:
1. 'Controversial opinion' hook
2. Bold prediction with timeline
3. 'Here are my reasons:' transition
4. Multiple supporting arguments with subheadings
5. Personal experience validation
6. Solution/opportunity identification
7. Value delivery promise
frameworks.prompt:
controversial opinion

by [TIMELINE] [BOLD PREDICTION]

here are my reasons:

[REASON 1]: [EXPLANATION WITH PERSONAL PAIN POINT]

[REASON 2]: [TECHNICAL/MARKET ADVANTAGE]

[REASON 3]: [ACCESSIBILITY/DEMOCRATIZATION ANGLE]

The real [BLOCKER] is [SPECIFIC CHALLENGE]

So I'll be [SOLUTION/VALUE DELIVERY]

Stay tuned

frameworks.title: Major Achievement + Team Building
frameworks.description: Announces significant business milestones while highlighting team growth and mission alignment.
frameworks.structure:
1. 'Major goal achieved' declaration
2. Specific achievement with social proof
3. Expected impact/improvement
4. Mission connection
5. Visual proof (often with image)
frameworks.prompt:
major goal achieved

[SPECIFIC ACHIEVEMENT WITH SOCIAL PROOF]

im expecting [QUANTIFIED IMPROVEMENT]

one step closer to the mission: [BIGGER VISION/GOAL]

frameworks.title: Rapid Execution Showcase
frameworks.description: Demonstrates speed and efficiency of systems/tools by showing dramatic time-to-value ratios with cost breakdowns.
frameworks.structure:
1. Time constraint + impressive outcome
2. Excitement/emotion expression
3. Cost efficiency highlight
4. Bulleted capability breakdown
5. Ownership vs. rental philosophy
6. Call-to-action for technical details
frameworks.prompt:
in [SHORT TIME] I went from nothing to [IMPRESSIVE OUTCOME]

this is fucking awesome because [COST/EFFICIENCY BENEFIT]

• [CAPABILITY 1]
• [CAPABILITY 2] 
• [CAPABILITY 3]
• [INTEGRATION DETAIL]

this is what [CATEGORY] looks like when you own it instead of rent it

DM me if you want the exact technical breakdown

frameworks.title: Weekend Hacker Announcement
frameworks.description: Builds anticipation for product launches by showcasing weekend development productivity with casual, confident tone.
frameworks.structure:
1. Product shipping announcement with timeline
2. Casual blessing/celebration of development time
3. Visual proof (GIF/image)
frameworks.prompt:
Shipping [PRODUCT DESCRIPTION] on [DAY]

God bless the weekend hackathons

frameworks.title: Lifestyle + Productivity Integration
frameworks.description: Shows the intersection of personal enjoyment and professional development, creating aspirational content around work-life integration.
frameworks.structure:
1. Lifestyle appreciation statement
2. Specific scene setting (time, place, activity)
3. Content consumption + creation combination
4. Application to business context
5. Visual proof of the moment
frameworks.prompt:
honestly doesn't get better than this.

[TIME/SETTING], [PERSONAL ENJOYMENT] + [LEARNING ACTIVITY], and [PRODUCTIVE APPLICATION]

frameworks.title: Tech Stack Authority
frameworks.description: Establishes technical credibility by sharing curated tool selections with brief, confident descriptions.
frameworks.structure:
1. Purpose statement
2. Tool category + specific tool + brief benefit
3. Concise, technical language
4. Comprehensive coverage of full stack
frameworks.prompt:
my tech stack to [SPECIFIC PURPOSE]

[TOOL CATEGORY]: [SPECIFIC TOOL] - [BRIEF BENEFIT]
[TOOL CATEGORY]: [SPECIFIC TOOL] - [BRIEF BENEFIT]
[Continue pattern...]

frameworks.title: Industry Insight + Personal Validation
frameworks.description: Shares strategic insights about industry shifts while positioning personal experience as validation of the trend.
frameworks.structure:
1. Prediction/insight statement
2. Risk/reward framing
3. Industry parallel/analogy
4. Role evolution description
5. Personal experience as proof
6. Pattern recognition claim
frameworks.prompt:
[INDUSTRY PREDICTION/INSIGHT]

there's a lot to gain by [OPPORTUNITY], and a lot to lose by [RISK]

i believe that [INDUSTRY] will experience the same [SHIFT TYPE] we're seeing in [PARALLEL INDUSTRY]

[ROLE EVOLUTION DESCRIPTION]

my work [PERSONAL EXPERIENCE] has made this pattern extremely obvious to me
